choose application

## explore the source code generated

## list all tasks
`gradle task`

## explore build.gradle
plugins
repositories

## compile project
`geadle compileJava`

## explore build output

## gradle clean

## run test
`gradle test`

## explore test report

## package

`gradle jar`

## execute application
`gradle run`

## force rerun of all dependent tasks
`gradle --rerun-tasks build`
